snippet: Colorado rejected sweeping school-reform measures while voters in Massachusetts rejected a proposal that sought to bring a $1 billion resort casino to East Boston.
abstract: Colorado voters reject higher taxes for sweeping school-reform measures while voters in Massachusetts reject proposal that sought to bring $1 billion resort casino to fading Suffolk Downs racetrack in East Boston.

byline.contributor: Katharine Q. Seelye contributed reporting from Boston.

lead_paragraph: Colorado rejected sweeping school-reform measures while voters in Massachusetts rejected a proposal that sought to bring a $1 billion resort casino to East Boston.

headline.main: Colorado Rejects Move for Schools as Casino Fails in Massachusetts
headline.print_headline: Colorado Rejects Higher Taxes for Schools as Casino Proposal Fails in Massachusetts
